description: This boy finished a carpenter apprenticeship but insisted on working only as an assistant carpenter. He wanted to gain some experience first. Then there was another problem as he couldn´t afford our fee. Why don´t people ever read through our terms? He was a bit scared but liked the taste of money and took care of my cock nicely. The little bastard had to be really horny because he came with my cock right up his ass!
title: Dirty Scout 120
